fields.name: medProfessionalWarning
fields.fieldText:
N.B.: Medical Professional Accounts are used for Medical Professionals that are NOT associated with a Medical Facility (i.e. they are self-employed).


If you wish to create a record for an Individual who is associated with one or more Medical Facilities, please exit this screen flow and create a Contact directly from the Medical Facility
